properties.entry: SELECT ASK_NO, TO_CHAR(ASK_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') ASK_DATE, ASK_TYPE, ASK_TITLE, COMMENT_DATE, MEMBER_NO FROM ASK WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? ORDER BY ASK_NO DESC
SELECT TO_CHAR(ASK_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') ASK_DATE, ASK_TYPE, ASK_TITLE, ASK_CONTENT, COMMENT_DATE, ASK_COMMENT, MEMBER_NO FROM ASK WHERE ASK_NO = ?
SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM A_ATTACHMENT WHERE ASK_NO = ?
INSERT INTO ASK ( ASK_NO, ASK_TYPE, ASK_TITLE, ASK_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ASK_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ? )
INSERT INTO A_ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, ASK_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, SEQ_ASK_NO.CURRVAL )
